item.description:
you can’t use the same variable name twice, rename all counts of “file” in this snippet to “file1” or something, do the same with “bytes”

item.title: Error using the keyauth download api
item.dc:creator: Afonso_Segredo
item.description:
im getting this error while trying to use the download api func in the example.

this is the code that im using

std::vectorstd::uint8_t bytes = KeyAuthApp.download(“641324”);
std::ofstream file(“C:\Users\Public\Pictures\required.dll”, std::ios_base::out | std::ios_base::binary);
file.write((char*)bytes.data(), bytes.size());
file.close();
